Package neqsim.pvtsimulation.simulation

Class MultiStageSeparatorTest

java.lang.Object
neqsim.pvtsimulation.simulation.BasePVTsimulation
neqsim.pvtsimulation.simulation.MultiStageSeparatorTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimulationInterface
public class MultiStageSeparatorTest extends BasePVTsimulation
Multi-stage separator test simulation for PVT analysis.

Simulates oil/gas separation through multiple separator stages to determine:

  • Stage-by-stage GOR (Gas-Oil Ratio)
  • Cumulative GOR
  • Oil Formation Volume Factor (Bo)
  • Solution Gas-Oil Ratio (Rs)
  • Stock-tank oil properties (API gravity)
  • Optimal separator conditions

Typical usage: 

 MultiStageSeparatorTest sepTest = new MultiStageSeparatorTest(reservoirFluid);
 sepTest.addSeparatorStage(50.0, 40.0); // HP separator: 50 bara, 40°C
 sepTest.addSeparatorStage(10.0, 30.0); // LP separator: 10 bara, 30°C
 sepTest.addSeparatorStage(1.01325, 15.0); // Stock tank: 1 atm, 15°C
 sepTest.run();
 
 System.out.println("Total GOR: " + sepTest.getTotalGOR() + " Sm3/Sm3");
 System.out.println("Bo: " + sepTest.getBo() + " m3/Sm3");
 System.out.println("API: " + sepTest.getStockTankAPIGravity());
Author:
ESOL

    • optimizeFirstStageSeparator

      public MultiStageSeparatorTest.OptimizationResult optimizeFirstStageSeparator(double minPressure, double maxPressure, int pressureSteps, double minTemperature, double maxTemperature, int temperatureSteps)
      Find optimal first-stage separator conditions to maximize stock tank oil recovery.

      This method performs a grid search over pressure and temperature ranges to find the separator conditions that maximize stock tank oil volume (minimize shrinkage). The optimization uses the current multi-stage configuration with the first stage conditions varied.

      Parameters:
      minPressure - Minimum separator pressure to search (bara)
      maxPressure - Maximum separator pressure to search (bara)
      pressureSteps - Number of pressure steps in search grid
      minTemperature - Minimum separator temperature to search (°C)
      maxTemperature - Maximum separator temperature to search (°C)
      temperatureSteps - Number of temperature steps in search grid
      Returns:
      OptimizationResult containing optimal conditions and corresponding properties

    • optimizeFirstStageSeparator

      public MultiStageSeparatorTest.OptimizationResult optimizeFirstStageSeparator()
      Find optimal separator conditions with default search ranges.

      Uses typical separator operating ranges:

      • Pressure: 5-80 bara with 16 steps
      • Temperature: 20-60°C with 9 steps
      Returns:
      OptimizationResult containing optimal conditions
